Finally, R scripts publish metadata (Ecological Metadata Language) data packages (e.g., Darwin format) discovery variety data portals oriented around slicing tabular gridded data (ERDDAP), biodographic analysis (OBIS), long-term archive (DataOne, NCEI) metadata discovery (InPort). database spatially enabled PostGIS summarizing data Areas Interest (AoIs), whether pre-defined (e.g., sanctuaries, MPAs, counties, etc.) arbitrary new areas.ERDDAP: great gridded tabular data, aggregate server clip specific area interest
